sqlMap.statement: SELECT TECH_INVTY_AGING_WRK_PK ,TECH_TOC_CD ,MDSE_CD ,RTL_WH_CD ,RTL_SWH_CD ,SER_NUM ,MDSE_NM ,INVTY_QTY ,RTRN_CTRL_FLG ,THIS_MTH_TOT_STD_COST_AMT ,FIRST_MTH_INVTY_QTY ,SCD_MTH_INVTY_QTY ,THIRD_MTH_INVTY_QTY ,OVER_FRTH_MTH_INVTY_QTY ,WH_MGR_PSN_CD ,WH_MGR_PSN_NM ,WH_NM ,SITE_SRVY_REQ_FLG FROM TECH_INVTY_AGING_WRK WHERE GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND TECH_INVTY_AGING_WRK_DT = #processDate# AND TECH_PROC_STS_CD = #techProcStsCd# AND EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY TECH_INVTY_AGING_WRK_PK
